Steve Ballmer was followed by Twitter CEO Dick Costolo , who trumpeted the one-line social network services' ability to strongly connect businesses with their clients and revamp the way audiences watch live television. People are starting to watch TV in real time again because in order to participate socially in Twitter that have to watch the show while it happens, Dick Costolo pointed out. Saying his`` heart was in Indiana,'' Mike Pence said he would continue to meet with the good and strong and opinionated people of this state before deciding his next move. During a question-and-answer session, Mike Pence said his proudest moment as a congressman came when he helped a Muncie mother avoid deportation to her home country of Sierra Leone.
